statements: SELECT * FROM appointments WHERE appointment_id = '1234'
SELECT client_name, appointment_date FROM appointments ORDER BY appointment_date DESC
SELECT appointment_time, client_name FROM appointments WHERE client_name LIKE '%John%'
SELECT appointment_date FROM appointments WHERE reminder IS NULL
SELECT appointment_id, client_name, appointment_time FROM appointments
SELECT * FROM appointments WHERE client_name = 'John Smith' ORDER BY appointment_date ASC, appointment_time DESC;
SELECT appointment_date, client_name, reminder FROM appointments WHERE appointment_date > '2022-01-01' ORDER BY client_name ASC;
SELECT appointment_id, appointment_date, reminder FROM appointments WHERE appointment_date BETWEEN '2022-06-01' AND '2022-06-30' ORDER BY appointment_id DESC;
SELECT appointment_id, client_name FROM appointments WHERE client_name LIKE 'M%' OR client_name LIKE 'S%' ORDER BY appointment_time ASC;
SELECT COUNT(*), DATE_TRUNC('MONTH', appointment_date) AS month FROM appointments GROUP BY month ORDER BY month DESC;
SELECT * FROM appointment_schedule;
SELECT client_name, appointment_date FROM appointment_schedule WHERE appointment_date = '2022-12-25';
SELECT assistant_name, appointment_time FROM appointment_schedule ORDER BY appointment_time DESC;
SELECT * FROM reminders WHERE reminder_date >= '2023-01-01';
SELECT assistant_name, reminder_description, reminder_date FROM reminders ORDER BY reminder_date ASC, reminder_time DESC;
SELECT * FROM appointment_schedule WHERE appointment_date = '2022-10-15'
SELECT assistant_name, client_name FROM appointment_schedule WHERE appointment_time > '14:00:00'
SELECT reminder_description FROM reminders WHERE reminder_date = '2022-10-15' ORDER BY reminder_time DESC
SELECT assistant_name, client_name FROM appointment_schedule WHERE appointment_date = '2022-10-15' AND appointment_time BETWEEN '10:00:00' AND '12:00:00'
SELECT DISTINCT assistant_name FROM reminders
SELECT * FROM appointments;
SELECT client_name, appointment_date, appointment_time FROM appointments ORDER BY appointment_date DESC;
SELECT DISTINCT appointment_type FROM appointments;
SELECT client_name, appointment_date, appointment_time, appointment_type FROM appointments WHERE appointment_date < '2022-01-01';
SELECT client_name, appointment_type FROM appointments WHERE client_name LIKE '%John%';
SELECT * FROM appointments ORDER BY appointment_date DESC;
SELECT appointment_id, appointment_type FROM appointments WHERE client_name = 'Alice' AND appointment_date > '2022-01-01';
SELECT client_name, appointment_date FROM appointments INNER JOIN clients ON appointments.client_name = clients.client_name WHERE appointments.appointment_type = 'Meeting';
SELECT client_name, client_email FROM clients INNER JOIN reminders ON clients.client_id = reminders.client_id WHERE reminders.reminder_date < '2022-12-31';
SELECT appointment_id, appointment_date, appointment_time FROM appointments WHERE appointment_id = 10;
SELECT * FROM appointments;
SELECT client_name, appointment_date, appointment_time FROM appointments WHERE appointment_date >= '2022-01-01';
SELECT appointment_id, client_name, appointment_date, appointment_time FROM appointments ORDER BY appointment_date DESC;
SELECT client_name, client_email, client_phone FROM clients WHERE client_email LIKE '%@example.com%';
SELECT assistant_name, assistant_specialty FROM assistants WHERE assistant_specialty='Psychology';
SELECT * FROM appointments;
SELECT client_name, appointment_date, appointment_time FROM appointments ORDER BY appointment_date DESC;
SELECT client_name, appointment_date, appointment_time FROM appointments WHERE client_name = 'Alice' AND appointment_date = '2022-10-05';
SELECT a.client_name, r.reminder_description, r.reminder_date FROM clients AS a JOIN reminders AS r ON a.client_id = r.client_id;
SELECT assistant_name, assistant_specialty FROM assistants WHERE assistant_specialty = 'Psychology' ORDER BY assistant_name ASC;
SELECT * FROM appointments;
SELECT id, title, appointment_datetime FROM reminders ORDER BY reminder_datetime DESC;
SELECT description, appointment_datetime FROM appointments WHERE id = 3;

SELECT users.first_name, appointments.title FROM users INNER JOIN user_appointments ON users.id = user_appointments.user_id INNER JOIN appointments ON user_appointments.appointment_id = appointments.id;
SELECT assistants.name, users.first_name, users.last_name FROM assistants INNER JOIN users ON assistants.user_id = users.id;
SELECT * FROM appointments LIMIT 5;
SELECT title, appointment_datetime FROM appointments WHERE appointment_datetime > NOW() ORDER BY appointment_datetime DESC;
SELECT u.first_name, u.last_name, a.title FROM users u JOIN user_appointments ua ON u.id = ua.user_id JOIN appointments a ON ua.appointment_id = a.id WHERE u.id = 1;
SELECT r.title, r.is_completed, a.appointment_datetime FROM reminders r JOIN appointments a ON r.id = a.id WHERE r.is_completed = TRUE;
SELECT a.title, a.description, ua.user_id, ua.appointment_id FROM appointments a JOIN user_appointments ua ON a.id = ua.appointment_id WHERE a.id < 10;
